operators.operator:
Equal to = A1 = B1 Some Description
Operator = :
A1 = B1 => returns true if all values in A1 are eual to all values in B2, otherwise returns false

Not equal to = A1 = B1 Some Description
Operator <> :
A1 <> B1 => returns true if all values in A1 are not equal to the values in B2, otherwise returns false

Greater than &gt A1 = B1 Some Description
Operator > :
A1 > B1 => returns true if A1 is greater than B1, otherwise returns false

Eqaul to = A1 = B1 Some Description
Operator < :
A1 < B1 => returns true if A1 is less than B1, otherwise returns false

Eqaul to = A1 = B1 Some Description
Operator >= :
A1 >= B1 => returns true if A1 is greater than or equal to B1, otherwise returns false

Eqaul to = A1 = B1 Some Description
Operator >= :
A1 <= B1 => returns true if A1 is less than or equal to B1, otherwise returns false
